name: best_price
description: Optimal purchase plan solver - find cheapest combination of shops to buy items

scripts.bf:all: echo 'Running brute-force tests...' && npx ts-node bestPrice.ts 5 && npx ts-node bestPrice.ts 8 && npx ts-node bestPrice.ts 10
scripts.dp:all: echo 'Running DP tests...' && npx ts-node bestPriceDP.ts 5 && npx ts-node bestPriceDP.ts 10 && npx ts-node bestPriceDP.ts 15 && npx ts-node bestPriceDP.ts 20
scripts.prod:build: npm run clean && npm run build && cp shops.json dist/
